guide.title: Gentoo Handbook
guide.abstract: The Gentoo Handbook is an effort to centralise documentation into a coherent handbook. Information that cannot be inserted coherently is not taken into account.

body.p: The Gentoo Linux 2004.3 Handbook is available in the following languages:
Danish | German | English | French | Indonesian | Italian | Japanese | Spanish | Traditional Chinese

Welcome to the Gentoo Linux 2004.3 Handbooks. These handbooks are released together with the Gentoo Linux releases and contain the necessary installation instructions to install Gentoo Linux 2004.3 without an internet connection.
However, if you want to install Gentoo Linux using the latest versions of all available packages, please use the Installation Instructions in the Gentoo Linux Handbook for your architecture.
